amendment.description: To authorize the President to utilize the Combatant Status Review Tribunals and Annual Review Board to determine the status of detainees held at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1505 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1505 proposed by Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S8810-8813; text as modified: CR S8811) To authorize the President to utilize the Combatant Status Review Tribunals and Annual Review Board to determine the status of detainees held at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
